verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>
Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> put <WH2330> forth <WH2330> a riddle, <WH2420> and speak <WH4911> a parable <WH4912> to the house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478>

And say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> A great <WH1419> eagle <WH5404> with great <WH1419> wings, <WH3671> long winged, <WH750> <WH83> full <WH4392> of feathers, <WH5133> which <WH834> had divers <WH7553> colors, <WH7553> came <WH935> to Lebanon, <WH3844> and took <WH3947> the highest <WH6788> branch <WH6788> of the cedar: <WH730>

He cropped <WH6998> off the top <WH7218> of his young <WH3242> twigs, <WH3242> and carried <WH935> it into a land <WH776> of traffic; <WH3667> he set <WH7760> it in a city <WH5892> of merchants. <WH7402>

He took <WH3947> also of the seed <WH2233> of the land, <WH776> and planted it in a fruitful <WH2233> field; <WH7704> he placed <WH3947> it by great <WH7227> waters, <WH4325> and set <WH7760> it as a willow <WH6851> tree.

And it grew, <WH6779> and became <WH1961> a spreading <WH5628> vine <WH1612> of low <WH8217> stature, <WH6967> whose branches <WH1808> turned <WH6437> toward <WH413> him, and the roots <WH8328> thereof were under <WH8478> him: so it became <WH1961> a vine, <WH1612> and brought <WH5375> forth <WH6213> branches, <WH905> and shot <WH7971> forth sprigs. <WH6288>

There was also another <WH259> great <WH1419> eagle <WH5404> with great <WH1419> wings <WH3671> and many <WH7227> feathers: <WH5133> and, behold, <WH2009> this <WH2063> vine <WH1612> did bend <WH3719> her roots <WH8328> toward <WH5921> him, and shot <WH7971> forth her branches <WH1808> toward <WH5921> him, that he might water <WH8248> it by the furrows <WH6170> of her plantation. <WH4302>

It was planted <WH8362> in a good <WH2896> soil <WH7704> by great <WH7227> waters, <WH4325> that it might bring <WH6213> forth <WH6213> branches, <WH6057> and that it might bear <WH5375> fruit, <WH6529> that it might be a goodly <WH155> vine. <WH1612>

Say <WH559> you, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Shall it prosper? <WH6743> shall he not pull <WH5423> up the roots <WH8328> thereof, and cut <WH7082> off the fruit <WH6529> thereof, that it wither? <WH3001> it shall wither <WH3001> in all <WH3605> the leaves <WH2964> of her spring, <WH6780> even without <WH3808> great <WH1419> power <WH2220> or many <WH7227> people <WH5971> to pluck <WH5375> it up by the roots <WH8328> thereof.

Yes, behold, <WH2009> being planted, <WH8362> shall it prosper? <WH6743> shall it not utterly wither, <WH3001> when the east <WH6921> wind <WH7307> touches <WH5060> it? it shall wither <WH3001> in the furrows <WH6170> where <WH5921> it grew. <WH6780>
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>

Say <WH559> now <WH4994> to the rebellious <WH4805> house, <WH1004> Know <WH3045> you not what <WH4100> these <WH428> things mean? tell <WH559> them, Behold, <WH2009> the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> is come <WH935> to Jerusalem, <WH3389> and has taken <WH3947> the king <WH4428> thereof, and the princes <WH8269> thereof, and led <WH935> them with him to Babylon; <WH894>

And has taken <WH3947> of the king's <WH4410> seed, <WH2233> and made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with him, and has taken <WH935> an oath <WH423> of him: he has also taken <WH3947> the mighty <WH352> of the land: <WH776>
That the kingdom <WH4467> might be base, <WH8217> that it might not lift <WH5375> itself up, but that by keeping <WH8104> of his covenant <WH1285> it might stand. <WH5975>

But he rebelled <WH4775> against him in sending <WH7971> his ambassadors <WH4397> into Egypt, <WH4714> that they might give <WH5414> him horses <WH5483> and much <WH7227> people. <WH5971> Shall he prosper? <WH6743> shall he escape <WH4422> that does <WH6213> such <WH428> things? or shall he break <WH6565> the covenant, <WH1285> and be delivered? <WH4422>

As I live, <WH2416> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> surely <WH518> <WH3808> in the place <WH4725> where the king <WH4428> dwells that made him king, <WH4427> whose <WH834> <WH853> oath <WH423> he despised, <WH959> and whose <WH853> covenant <WH1285> he broke, <WH6565> even with him in the middle <WH8432> of Babylon <WH894> he shall die. <WH4191>

Neither <WH3808> shall Pharaoh <WH6547> with his mighty <WH1419> army <WH2428> and great <WH7227> company <WH6951> make <WH6213> for him in the war, <WH4421> by casting <WH8210> up mounts, <WH5550> and building <WH1129> forts, <WH1785> to cut <WH3772> off many <WH7227> persons: <WH5315>

Seeing he despised <WH959> the oath <WH423> by breaking <WH6565> the covenant, <WH1285> when, see, <WH2009> he had given <WH5414> his hand, <WH3027> and has done <WH6213> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things, he shall not escape. <WH4422>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> As I live, <WH2416> surely <WH518> <WH3808> my oath <WH423> that he has despised, <WH959> and my covenant <WH1285> that he has broken, <WH6331> even it will I recompense <WH5414> on his own head. <WH7218>

And I will spread <WH6566> my net <WH7568> on him, and he shall be taken <WH8610> in my snare, <WH4686> and I will bring <WH935> him to Babylon, <WH894> and will plead <WH8199> with him there <WH8033> for his trespass <WH4604> that he has trespassed <WH4604> against me.

And all <WH3605> his fugitives <WH4015> with all <WH3605> his bands <WH102> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> and they that remain <WH7604> shall be scattered <WH6566> toward all <WH3605> winds: <WH7307> and you shall know <WH3045> that I the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it.

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I will also take <WH3947> of the highest <WH6788> branch <WH6788> of the high <WH7311> cedar, <WH730> and will set <WH5414> it; I will crop <WH6998> off from the top <WH7218> of his young <WH3127> twigs <WH3127> a tender <WH7390> one, and will plant <WH8362> it on an high <WH1364> mountain <WH2022> and eminent: <WH8524>

In the mountain <WH2022> of the height <WH4791> of Israel <WH3478> will I plant <WH8362> it: and it shall bring <WH5375> forth <WH5375> boughs, <WH6057> and bear <WH6213> fruit, <WH6529> and be a goodly <WH117> cedar: <WH730> and under <WH8478> it shall dwell <WH7931> all <WH3605> fowl <WH6833> of every <WH3605> wing; <WH3671> in the shadow <WH6738> of the branches <WH1808> thereof shall they dwell. <WH7931>

And all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> shall know <WH3045> that I the LORD <WH3068> have brought <WH8213> down <WH8213> the high <WH1364> tree, <WH6086> have exalted <WH1361> the low <WH8217> tree, <WH6086> have dried <WH3001> up the green <WH3892> tree, <WH6086> and have made the dry <WH3002> tree <WH6086> to flourish: <WH6524> I the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> and have done <WH6213> it.
